welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Flanders, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport serves private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth during peak hours.
